verbs.description: arrests imminent in probe of galway police department multiple police officers who [V: have] worked for the tiny galway village police department are scheduled to be arrested next week following a two - year investigation by the state attorney general office people briefed on the case but not authorized to comment publicly said the attorney general investigation was spurred by allegations made by two former galway police officers troy police department galway police richard schoonmaker sr state police mayor william hyde albany police department fred scheidt galway department leslie r klein mark e laviolette
